<text lang="cn">
#### 多张图片预览
点击左右切换按钮可以预览多张图片。
</text>

```html
<template>
    <div>
        <s-image-preview-group>
            <s-image
                width="200"
                height="200"
                src="https://baidu.github.io/san/img/logo-colorful.svg" />
            <s-image
                width="200"
                height="200"
                src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," />
        </s-image-preview-group>
    </div>
</template>

<script>
import {Image} from 'santd';

export default {
    components: {
        's-image': Image,
        's-image-preview-group': Image.PreviewGroup
    }
}
</script>
```
